events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but it does not fit me well. I would like to request a refund for this order as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund based on the request for money back and exchange.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that doesn't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to process your request efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 12345XYZ. The jacket is too small despite checking the size chart.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you ship the jacket back using our prepaid return label.
That sounds good to me. Please send the return label to my email so I can send the jacket back right away.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 3 to 5 business days.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the quick and helpful support!
We are glad to hear that your refund was received successfully. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
